name: Google Toolbar Whitener
description:
Turns Google's Toolbar white again. Derived from https://github.com/frankkohlhepp/toolbarwhitener

Mozilla (Firefox) Version.
css:
/*
// Copyright (c) 2011 Frank Kohlhepp
// Copyright (c) 2011 Mathias Panzenb√∂ck
// https://github.com/frankkohlhepp/toolbarwhitener
// License: GPL v2
*/

@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document
	domain(google.de),
	domain(google.com),
	domain(google.at),
	domain(google.pl),
	domain(google.fr),
	domain(google.nl),
	domain(google.it),
	domain(google.com.tr),
	domain(google.es),
	domain(google.ch),
	domain(google.be),
	domain(google.gr),
	domain(google.com.br),
	domain(google.lu),
	domain(google.fi),
	domain(google.pt),
	domain(google.hu),
	domain(google.hr),
	domain(google.bg),
	domain(google.com.mx),
	domain(google.si),
	domain(google.sk),
	domain(google.ro),
	domain(google.ca),
	domain(google.co.uk),
	domain(google.cl),
	domain(google.com.ar),
	domain(google.se),
	domain(google.cz),
	domain(google.dk),
	domain(google.co.th),
	domain(google.com.co),
	domain(google.lt),
	domain(google.co.id),
	domain(google.co.in),
	domain(google.co.il),
	domain(google.com.eg),
	domain(google.cn),
	domain(google.co.ve),
	domain(google.ru),
	domain(google.co.jp),
	domain(google.com.pe),
	domain(google.com.au),
	domain(google.co.ma),
	domain(google.co.za),
	domain(google.com.ph),
	domain(google.com.sa),
	domain(google.ie),
	domain(google.co.kr),
	domain(google.no),
	domain(google.com.ec),
	domain(google.com.vn),
	domain(google.lv),
	domain(google.com.mt),
	domain(google.com.uy),
	domain(google.ae),
	domain(google.ba),
	domain(google.co.nz),
	domain(google.com.ua),
	domain(google.co.cr),
	domain(google.ee),
	domain(google.com.do),
	domain(google.com.tw),
	domain(google.com.hk),
	domain(google.com.my),
	domain(google.com.sv),
	domain(google.com.pr),
	domain(google.lk),
	domain(google.com.gt),
	domain(google.com.bd),
	domain(google.com.pk),
	domain(google.is),
	domain(google.li),
	domain(google.com.bh),
	domain(google.com.ni),
	domain(google.com.py),
	domain(google.com.ng),
	domain(google.com.bo),
	domain(google.co.ke),
	domain(google.hn),
	domain(google.com.sg),
	domain(google.mu),
	domain(google.ci),
	domain(google.jo),
	domain(google.nu),
	domain(google.com.jm),
	domain(google.com.ly),
	domain(google.co.yu),
	domain(google.tt),
	domain(google.com.kh),
	domain(google.ge),
	domain(google.com.na),
	domain(google.com.et),
	domain(google.sm),
	domain(google.cd),
	domain(google.gm),
	domain(google.com.qa),
	domain(google.dj),
	domain(google.com.cu),
	domain(google.com.pa),
	domain(google.gp),
	domain(google.az),
	domain(google.as),
	domain(google.pl),
	domain(google.mn),
	domain(google.ht),
	domain(google.md),
	domain(google.am),
	domain(google.sn),
	domain(google.je),
	domain(googlee.com),
	domain(google.com.bn),
	domain(google.com.ai),
	domain(google.co.zm),
	domain(google.ma),
	domain(google.rw),
	domain(google.co.ug),
	domain(google.com.vc),
	domain(googlenews.de),
	domain(google.com),
	domain(google.at),
	domain(google.com.gi),
	domain(google.to),
	domain(google.com.om),
	domain(google.kz),
	domain(google.co.uz) {

/* Bar Color */
#gbx3, #gbx4 {
    background: -moz-linear-gradient(
        top,
        rgb(255, 255, 255) 0%,
        rgb(255, 255, 255) 70%,
        rgb(250, 250, 250) 100%
    ) !important;
    border-bottom-color: rgb(239, 239, 239) !important;
    box-shadow: 0 1px 0 rgb(201, 215, 241) !important;
}

/* Bar Item Hover Color */
.gbzt-hvr, .gbgt-hvr {
    background: -moz-linear-gradient(
        top,
        rgb(239, 243, 251) 0%,
        rgb(239, 243, 251) 70%,
        rgb(226, 230, 238) 100%
    ) !important;
}

/* Bar Active Item Color */
.gbt .gbz0l .gbtb2 {
    border-top-color: rgb(26, 84, 225) !important;
}

/* Text Color */
#mngb, .gbts {
    color: rgb(51, 102, 204) !important;
}

/* Active Text Color */
.gbz0l .gbts {
    color: rgb(54, 54, 54) !important;
}

/* Settings Splitter */
.gbts {
    background-position: 0 -22px !important;
}

/* Settings Icon */
#gbi5 {
    background-position: -6px -22px !important;
}

}
